title: Pls help Leaver buster bug
body:
I was in champ select when i selected my champ  my game crashed so i tried to to restart it so i can get into the game the client didn't want to start so i restarted my pc i launched the client  and logged in and it displayed a message saying that i have been put in lower priority for 5 games.I sent a bug report
and qued so i could play  a game then in champ select i locked in my champ and  some one on the enemy team dodged and i said some one left the que during champ select so you have been put back in que then i noticed i didn't see a timer and it was saying that i must lock in a varity of roles to continue no one else was in the lobby with me when that message was gone it reset my que
then i was in que for 14 mins then it reset my que timer to 20 so i continue waited then after that timer was done i was sat in que for another 10 mins waiting on a game then it stopped randomly  again is there anyway can this get removed or can i get some compensation it makes no sense i waste time for something that was not my fault

replies.body:
We won't be able to remove that LPQ :/ but I can help provide some solutions on what could be causing that mess of a situation.

It sounds like there's something going on with your connection, since it's happening during champ select. This [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664) will be able to narrow down what's going on. Go through all the steps and test it out in a customs game.

If you're still running into issues queuing up, our Tech team can take a look at it if you [send us a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).
